body:
Clarify isnan's namespace, because Fujitsu compiler can't resolve ambiguous of 'isnan' function.
- Error 
2441 /path_to_bpp-core/spack-src/src/Bpp/Numeric/Function/ThreePointsNumericalDerivative.cpp:56:51: error: c     
     all to 'isnan' is ambiguous
title: bpp-core: Clarify 'isnan' function's namespace.
